unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Good idea in theory. Farmer Raju in Karnataka told me it helped after that crazy hailstorm last year. But the paperwork, bhai! It's like deciphering ancient Sanskrit texts! Heard ICICI Lombard payouts were slow. Hope things improve before Diwali. Gotta protect that rice crop for yummy biryani, right? It's crucial, especially with unpredictable monsoons. Jai Kisan!
